channel.title: CVE Feed for Chatwork Co., Ltd. -- Chatwork Desktop Application (Mac)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Chatwork Co., Ltd. -- Chatwork Desktop Application (Mac)

item.title: CVE-2023-32546|2024-08-02T15:18:37.634Z -- chatwork%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- chatwork%20desktop%20application%20%28mac%29
item.description: Code injection vulnerability exists in Chatwork Desktop Application (Mac) 2.6.43 and earlier. If this vulnerability is exploited, a non-administrative user of the Mac where the product is installed may store and obtain audio and image data from the product without the user's consent.
